survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Drone Delivery Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess customer satisfaction and identify areas for improvement in drone delivery services.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use drone delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to gauge usage frequency. Ensure options are exhaustive and mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use drone delivery services?

questions.question_text: What types of items do you typically have delivered via drone? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to understand common delivery categories. Include an 'Other' option for unlisted items.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What types of items do you typically have delivered via drone? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1.

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the speed of drone deliveries? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled.
